output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the required criteria:
1. CMF Number: - Present: CMF 11240015, indicating this is official electoral propaganda
2. Reference to Candidate: - Directly mentions "Elena Lasconi" multiple times - Explicitly promotes her as presidential candidate - Clearly identifies her as USR's presidential candidate
3. Addresses Wide Population: - High impression count (200,000-250,000) - Large estimated audience (100,001-500,000) - Paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Addresses "argeșeni" and Romanians in general
4. Electoral Objective: - Clear call to vote ("Fiecare vot contează") - Explicitly promotes "Elena Lasconi la Președinție" - Presents campaign promises and vision - Direct electoral messaging combining presidential and parliamentary campaigns
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is clearly campaign material, not journalism - Contains campaign promises and political messaging - Includes party slogans and direct electoral calls to action
6. Personal Opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but an official party communication - Contains structured campaign messaging - Uses official campaign identifier (CMF)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Makes campaign promises - Calls for votes - Is a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - Uses official party channels and messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: USR, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral platit pe Facebook (ID: 569180649096733) care continua propaganda electorala pentru candidatul prezidential Elena Lasconi dupa incheierea perioadei legale de campanie. Postarea, activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, contine un mesaj explicit de sustinere electorala ("Elena Lasconi la Președinție"), are numar CMF (11240015), si a ajuns la un public estimat intre 200,000 si 250,000 de persoane, reprezentand o clara continuare a propagandei electorale in afara perioadei permise de lege.
